Posts.Title: Cytoxan and Taxotere Katski Katski

Posts.Content: Jan 22, 2013 10:24PM Katski wrote: Thank you for all of your supportive comments.  Fortunately, my center let me meet with the radiation nurse to go over all of my questions.  I had my last of 6 chemos today and went to Radiology.  I said I had some concerns and it was like johnny-on-the-spot!!  That was a first not to have to make an appointment and come back.  SAD and my bi-polar was addressed too.  So, happy dance today!!!
Posts.Title: No breasts now Katski liefie

Posts.Content: Katski wrote: I have no breast and am wondering how they can do radiation.  My two areas are concaved now and am worried about my skin reaction and how they can get it right.  I am a red-head and have not been out in the sun for 40 years now.  I am so afraid of the side effects.  Aloe is not a healing agent for me.  Help me please. Dx 6/2012, ILC, Stage IIIA, 11/22 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Chemotherapy 9/25/2012 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Radiation Therapy Breast, Lymph nodes Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: No breasts now Katski liefie

Posts.Content: Jan 22, 2013 12:52AM Katski wrote: So, having no breast mounds, radiation is the same as having breasts sticking out.  I am scared because of having a flat chest and I can't find any information on this.  Cancer sure does suck along with the no information on my worries.  I do not have tissue expanders on my chest so it is concaved and how will the radiation beams affect those areas.  Aloe is not my friend, never has been.
Posts.Title: No breasts now Katski liefie

Posts.Content: Katski wrote: All the docs were so proud of me for finishing rads.  Now a week later, I wished I had stopped at day 20.  My skin is separating from my breast and it is one open angry looking thing.  And the neck part is hurting like a 12 on the pain scale.  Rads nurse has put an allederm patch on the neck area which does feel better now.  This open part on my skin worries me.  She said to use the cream but leave it open.  I worry about infection, etc.  I am taking a pain pill for the pain now after crying how bad I hurt.(I guess a little drama does work but I should not have had to cry).  I am allergic to sulfa so the creams are limited.  I am making sure there is no friction and stuff but really am worried about infection.  Any ideas?  (I am airing it too). Dx 6/2012, ILC, Stage IIIA, 11/22 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Chemotherapy 9/25/2012 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Radiation Therapy Breast, Lymph nodes Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Finished required rad treatments--week later skin Katski MameMe

Posts.Content: Katski wrote: Ladies, you have to help me out here!  I am so frustrated!  RO wants 28 days but no boosts due to expanders being removed so no skin cells to radiate.  I want to do 15 days and wonder why I can't!  Please comment and give me opinions. This is all a ball of confusion and it is not helping me to heal. Posts.Title: I DO NOT want 28 days of radiation and no boosts! Katski foxford

Posts.Content: Katski wrote: I feel ugly, no boobs. no hair, no personality and feel like a freak.  This disease has taken all of my self worth and thrown it to the monsters.  No one wants to see me or have coffe.  It just sucks all around.  I a an A personalily being pushed into an e.  I hate and and dispiese like the plague.
